input.sentences: it was a snowy day outside and the lots of shopping centers were vacant .
a nearby store was open but quite empty .
teenagers gathered around to watch something on a window display at another store .
the man near the crowd of teenagers played a song on his guitar .
down the street a man watched a young girl build a snowball .
output.sentences: The shopping center is vacant from the snowy weather.
It is always fun to set at the window to watch teenagers go by.
The teenagers asked to guy to play a song.
I watched a snowball fight go on in the street.
